content:
No such thing for Android. Thunderbird for Android is designed for mobile screens, and table view does not fit.

Also, Thunderbird for Android is not a port (modified version) of Thunderbird for Desktop, therefore it doesn't have many desktop features.
creator: wsmwk

content: "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to configure > "Sending mail" > tick "Upload sent messages (Upload sent messages to Sent folder after sending)".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
